_meanings:
or {#kuSasTalI#} The capital of Dakṣiṇa-Kośala
and situated in the defiles of the Vindhya; it must
have been to the north of the Narmadā but south
of the Vindhya, and is probably the same as
Ramnagar in Bundelkhand. Rājaśekhara calls the
lord of Kuśasthalī {#maDyadeSanareMdra#}, the lord of the 
middle-land or Bundelkhand.
